text: Marianne Berglund, born 23 June 1963 in Skellefte√•, Sweden is a Swedish former road racing cyclist. She won the women's road race during the UCI Road World Championships in Altenrhein, Switzerland on 3 September. She has also won the Tour of Texas. She won the first edition of Tjejtrampet in the year of 1990. ==References== ==Other websites== * Radsportseiten Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish sportspeople Category:Cyclists
title: Marianne Berglund
